verses.name: Amos 3:1
verses.text: Hear this word that the Lord hath spoken against you, O children of Israel, against the whole family which I brought up from the land of Egypt, saying,

verses.name: Amos 3:2
verses.text: You only have I known of all the families of the earth: therefore I will punish you for all your iniquities.

verses.name: Amos 3:3
verses.text: Can two walk together, except they be agreed?

verses.name: Amos 3:4
verses.text: Will a lion roar in the forest, when he hath no prey? will a young lion cry out of his den, if he have taken nothing?
